FULL-STACK WEB DEVELOPER

Hello, I'm Tolu!


I use HTML, CSS & Javascript to bring designs to life. I specialize in creating clean, fast and accessible websites using appropriate front-end technologies and techniques. I am also adept in using Python/Flask as well as SQL to deliver top-notch backend solutions

ABOUT ME

Who Am I?

My name is Toluwanimi Sola-Adeyemi. I am from Lagos, Nigeria. I am a full-stack web developer with a focus on replicating designs using the appropriate front-end techniques as well as back-end and security techniques.

I have a Bachelor's in English Literature as well as an MsC in Finance, both from the University of Kentucky. Evidently, I love solving problems and learning new things.

While not coding or learning, I enjoy watching documentaries on Netflix, working out, reading, trying out new food recipes, and also spending quality time with friends and family.
